Package org.cougaar.mts.std

This package contains optional MTS software components that are used for a production Cougaar runtime.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AgentLocalStatusServlet This Servlet displays the local MTS statistics, as returned by the AgentStatusService. for the Agent in which it's loaded.
AgentRemoteStatusServlet This Servlet displays the remote MTS statistics, as returned by the AgentStatusService, for the Agent in which it's loaded.
AgentStatusAspect This Aspect implements the AgentStatusService.
AgentStatusServlet This servlet displays MTS statistics for the Agent in which it's loaded.
ChecksumStreamsAspect This class provides an example of adding trailers to serialized AttributedMessages.
CountBytesStreamsAspect This Aspect counts the bytes of an outgoing message flowing by and sets a local attribute org.cougaar.core.message.count with the final value.
DeliveryVerificationAspect This Aspect logs the delivery of messages, as well as the delay if the delivery takes awhile.
DestinationQueueMonitorPlugin This Component loads the DestinationQueueMonitorServlet.
DestinationQueueMonitorServlet This Servlet displays the state of the DestinationQueues.
DestinationThreadConstrictor This test Component restricts the number of available threads and modifies the thread queue order to be more fair with the remaining rights.
DetectBigMessageAspect This Aspect logs large messages, where large is defined by the MaxMsgLen parameter as a threshold number of bytes.
DirectiveAckAspect After delivering a DirectiveMessage with a non-null value for the AttributeConstants.RECEIPT_REQUESTED attribute, try to inject a receipt message back to the sending Agent contain the reply status for each RelayDirective it contains.
MessageQueueDumpServiceComponent This class and its related service have a very specialized role.
MessageSendTimeAspect Aspect that tags all messages with a "send time" attribute when they enter the MTS SendLink.
MessageTimeoutAspect Aspect to throw out a timed out message.
MessageWatcherServiceImpl This entity implements the MessageWatcherService.
MulticastAspect This Aspect provides support for multicast messages.
OldIncarnationAspect This Aspect assists in the detection of out-of-date incarnations of Agents.
OutOfBandMessageAspect Service provider and implementation for OutOfBandMessageService
PreserializingStreamsAspect This test Aspect preserializes messages into a byte array, sends the array instead of the message over the RMI stream, and then deserializes on the other end.
SequenceAspect This Aspect adds sequence numbers to messages, and enforces sequencing based on those numbers.
StatisticsAspect This Aspect gathers message size and count statistics using the InputStream and OutputStream of streamed protocols.
StatisticsPlugin This Plugin loads three servlets: StatisticsServlet, AgentRemoteStatusServlet and AgentLocalStatusServlet.
StatisticsServlet This Servlet uses the MessageStatistics to display message size and count statistics for the Node.
WatcherAspect This Aspect is used in conjunction with MessageWatcherServiceImpl, the implementaion of the MessageWatcherService.
 

Exception Summary
DetectBigMessageAspect.MessageTooBigException  
 

Package org.cougaar.mts.std Description

This package contains optional MTS software components that are used for a production Cougaar runtime. These component can be omitted to make a smaller, but less robust Cougaar runtime.

Note that, this package should only contain production maturity Aspects, Services, and Servlets. Optional Link Protocols are in the mtslinks project.

For a more complete description of the MTS, see Message Transport Service online manual .
